thread.title: These photos show how damaging the windstorm was across Michigan
thread.title_full: These photos show how damaging the windstorm was across Michigan

author: Benjamin Raven | braven@mlive.com
title: These photos show how damaging the windstorm was across Michigan
text: It turns out that wind speeds of 50-70 mph can't stop MLive photographers from stepping out and capturing the action. This post will include photos from across the state Wednesday with notes, updates and a look back on the windstorm across Michigan.
